bibl.title: P66 and P75 on John 1:3/4.
bibl.note: P66 = P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426) is punctuated only sporadically and not at all at vss. 3/4 of John 1. P75 = P. Bodmer XIV-XV (= van Haelst 406) is possibly our earliest witness, certainly our earliest punctuated witness; it also gives the lectio difficilior. The author reconsiders the interpretation of the text in a monograph in progress.
Miller E.L., P66 and P75 on John 1:3/4.
